org.workplicity.util
Class Helper

java.lang.Object
  org.workplicity.util.Helper

public class Helper
extends java.lang.Object

This is a convenience class offering help with many different utility methods.

                            java.lang.String password,
                            org.workplicity.worklet.WorkletContext context)
Logs in a user and creates the initial ticket, if there is one. Assumes a valid ticket is in the IWC and writes a ticket into the IWC.

Parameters:
logname - User's logname
password - User's password
context - Worklet context

                                        java.lang.String criteria,
                                        org.workplicity.worklet.WorkletContext context)

criteria - Query criteria.
context - Worklet context
Returns:
Query results

insert

public static boolean insert(org.workplicity.entry.Entry entry,
                             org.workplicity.worklet.WorkletContext context)
Inserts an entry into the root repository. If the entry id == -1, a new entry is inserted. If id != -1, the method attempts to update the entry of that id, if it is found. Assumes a valid ticket is in the IWC and writes a ticket into the IWC.

Parameters:
entry - Entry
context - Worklet context
Returns:
True if insert successful, false otherwise.

insert

public static boolean insert(org.workplicity.entry.Entry entry,
                             java.lang.String repos,
                             org.workplicity.worklet.WorkletContext context)
Inserts an entry into the repository. If the entry id == -1, a new entry is inserted. If id != -1, the method attempts to update the entry of that id, if it is found. Assumes a valid ticket is in the IWC and writes a ticket into the IWC.

Parameters:
entry - Entry
repos - Repository common name
context - WOrklet context
Returns:
True if insert successful, false otherwise.
